RT @TheSheendex: #SundaySerotonin Michael Sheen and David Tennant in WHAT HAS HAPPEN TO YOUR HAIR!? [transcript in thread] https://t.co/6Ay
RT @TheSheendex: Michael Sheen and David Tennant on Aziraphale and Crowley "you know they're gonna end up in each others arms..." [transcri
M: Then what do you say? Do you say, well I just did it American? Or do you just go oh ok.. D: Ramp it up M: ...then do exactly the same thing again and hope that it's...? D: yeah...

M: That's why you get self conscious! D: EXACTLY! M: I'm sorry, I'm sorry! D: Right there! M: I once did an audition for an American film, and I did it American, and at the end of it they said "and would you mind doing it American?" D: [laughs painfully]

D: and I'm sort of going [in American accent] "can I get a cappucino please?" [in his own accent] "I'm so sorry, please don't mind me" M: I thought you said you did an American accent...? D: Awwwwww [dies inside] M: Oh see! See! D: See!

Michael: if I'm playing an American character in things I tend to keep that going David: do you, all the time? M: yeah because I find it harder D: yeah, I do it a bit and then I get a bit self conscious M: yeah
Michael Sheen and David Tennant discuss doing accents [transcript in thread] https://t.co/a3NdA6XWDE
